actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to the number of individuals who may be shareholders in subchapter S corporations.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase from 15 to 25 the maximum number of individuals who may be shareholders in a corporation which has maintained Subchapter S corporate status for five consecutive taxable years.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to the number of individuals who may be shareholders in subchapter S corporations.
